feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: What is humans.txt and how have you configure it for your site?

link.title: What is humans.txt and how have you configure it for your site?

entry.content: Humans.txt is a txt file that is created and added to the root of your website with the aim to share information about people behind it. In my website I created a humans.txt with some information about me.
entry.summary: Humans.txt is a txt file that is created and added to the root of your website with the aim to share information about people behind it. In my website I created a humans.txt with some information about me.

entry.title: What is Open Graph and how do you make use of it?

link.title: What is Open Graph and how do you make use of it?

entry.content:
Open Graph protocol is a protocol, created in 2010, used for integrating your site with social media. It was created by facebook in order to promote integration between facebook and other websites by allowing them to become rich “graph” objects with some functionality of other facebook objects.

You can make use of Open Graph by adding some specific meta tags into the source code of your website. Specifically for my website, I added some meta tags in order to sites, e.g. facebook, display a graph object with title, url and image of my site once it’s URL is shared there.
entry.summary: Open Graph protocol is a protocol, created in 2010, used for integrating your site with social media. It was created by facebook in order to promote integration between facebook and other websites by allowing them to become rich “graph” objects with some functionality of other facebook objects.

entry.title: What is robots.txt
entry.content:
What is robots.txt and how have you configure it for your site?

Robots.txt is a txt file that is used as a filter for search engines and search bots, e.g. googlebot. It is through this file that the developers define, e.g., access permissions to specific pages and resources that belongs to a specific website. It’s syntax is simple and it is saved in the root folder of the website project.

My website has nothing that I would not allow to be accessed and, thus, my robots.txt is set to allow access to all its resources and pages.
entry.summary: What is robots.txt and how have you configure it for your site?
